CommandDefinition.Name: benchmark
CommandDefinition.Description: Inserts a given number of orders and calculates the resulting performance in Hz.

Argument.Name: orderType
Argument.Description: The ordertype that is created for benchmark purposes

Argument.Name: numberOfCalls
Argument.Description: The number of orders started per run

Argument.Name: numberOfRuns
Argument.Description: The number of times the benchmark is repeated

Argument.Name: maxParallel
Argument.Description: The maximum number of orders running in parallel. This uses a capacity
